about_the_game:
In Shallow Pond, you play as Ripples, a water creature in a diving suit. Traverse both land and water seamlessly, discover unique environments, and interact with strange, playful creatures. Face off against bizarre enemies, find hidden treasures, and build unexpected friendships.

Enjoy this cozy 3D adventure platformer filled with fun and excitement. Glide underwater like a penguin or explore strange lands in your diving suit, uncovering new areas and hidden secrets. Expand your movement abilities as you take on quirky enemies and face the weird, wonderful world beyond the pond.

Features

  • A vibrant world filled with lush meadows, juicy lakes, and a unique art style that brings it all to life.

  • Smooth, fluid movement lets you seamlessly glide through every part of the game, creating an uninterrupted, satisfying experience.

  • Unlock new abilities to overcome challenges and discover beautiful, hidden locations.

  • Build meaningful friendships and form a special connection with an unexpected ally as you search for your lost treasure.
